item.title: Atom Golang Setup
item.description: I’ve recently switched to Atom from Sublime Text for web development. The transition was relatively painless since many of the keyboard shortcuts and capabilities are the same in. I really enjoy usig Atom and want to have that same experience with programming in Go. This documents my Go setup in Atom. Install and Configuration Steps Install go-plus Set the go-plus GOPATH setting Ideally the Atom application process should have GOPATH in its ENV and you shouldn’t have to set this.
